item.title: Whyalla Travel Guide (Eyre Peninsula/South Australia/Australia/Oceania)

item.title: San Juan Travel Guide (La Union/Ilocos/Luzon/Philippines/Southeast Asia/Asia)
item.description: Discover San Juan, a small town in La Union, Philippines, known for its rich cultural history, natural wonders, and outdoor adventures. From historic sites and museums to beautiful beaches and scenic mountain views, this comprehensive travel guide has everything you need to plan your next trip to San Juan.
